duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide Systems Engineering assistance that applies a broad theoretical and practical knowledge of system engineering to the acquisition process.
Provide engineering support in the design, operation, and sustainment of systems and components throughout the acquisition life cycle.
Assist in designing, planning execution, analysis, reporting, and documentation during any phase of test and evaluation programs.
Participate in the development of system specifications and system architecture products.
Participate in test and evaluation support including test planning, test conduct, and evaluation of test results against operational requirements.
Provide technical evaluation of contractor proposals.
Support the development of system and program’s technical plans and the review of technical documents.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in a professional engineering discipline (Master's Degree preferred)
